subject: Re: [junit] Usage of a own testTunner
msgSnippet: On Mon, Oct 26, 2009 at 6:56 PM, eclipse.beginner ... Hi. Have you looked at the new TestWatchman rule released in JUnit 4.7 to see if this ll fit your needs?
messageBody:
On Mon, Oct 26, 2009 at 6:56 PM, eclipse.beginner
<eclipse.beginner@...> wrote:

> I want to write my own junit4 runner, to add my testListener.
>
> Which not internal Â runner has a similar functionality?
> Or how can I also use my own listener (extends RunListener).

Hi. Have you looked at the new TestWatchman rule released in JUnit 4.7
to see if this'll fit your needs? Or a custom rule entirely?

- alistair
